fields.name: Rod of Ages
fields.description: +300 Health +400 Mana +60 Ability Power Passive: Grants +20 Health, +40 Mana, and +4 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +400 Mana, and +40 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks). UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
